author: soispoke
content: First inital commits towards a FOCIL PoC  by <@475003996466315277>: https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/pull/14267 any feedback is more than welcome

author: potuz
content: Not much feedback to give there as it's just the protos. Are you planning on broadcasting the full transactions with the inclusion lists in this iteration?

author: soispoke
content: sure, just nice to see people have actively started working on it, and with the local ILs sent by IL committee members, yes

author: terencechain
content: Hm I need to review the research post again. Should the block body have the inclusion lists? I've always thought the ILaggregate is just broadcasted 3 seconds earlier than the block and the execution payload's transactions satisfies it
